definition: harmful and without benefit (idiom); more harm than good
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
to do harm to/to cause trouble to/harm/evil/calamity

sentences.english: Avoid malcontents and pessimists. They dray you down and contribute nothing.
sentences.chinese: 避免結交不滿意者和悲觀者，他們對你有害無益。

sentences.english: Avoid malcontents and pessimists. They drag you down and contribute nothing.
sentences.chinese: 避免結交不滿意者和悲觀者，他們對你有害無益。

sentences.english: In fact, actin ring seals tight unhelpful.
sentences.chinese: 其實動環密封圈過緊有害無益。

sentences.english: There is also evidence that too much happiness can be bad for your career.
sentences.chinese: 許多證據表明，興奮過度對你的工作有害無益。

sentences.english: However, bad books be to do us lot harm dawn bad.
sentences.chinese: 然而，壞書卻對咱們有害無益。

sentences.english: Many of the behaviours that children acquire at home would be counterproductive elsewhere.
sentences.chinese: 孩子在家習得的許多行爲在別處則是有害無益的。

sentences.english: This outlook on life is psychologically harmful and physically detrimental.
sentences.chinese: 這種生活觀對心理和生理都有害無益。

sentences.english: Moreover , even the appearance of ageing can be harmful.
sentences.chinese: 而且，衰老的樣子也是有害無益的。

sentences.english: Excessive polite in family bring more harm than benefit.
sentences.chinese: 過分的客氣對於家庭有害無益。

sentences.english: However, bad books be to do us abundance harm dawn bad.
sentences.chinese: 然而，壞書卻對咱們有害無益。

sentences.english: However, bad books will do us more harm than good.
sentences.chinese: 就這樣，壞書卻對俺們有害無益喜悅。

sentences.english: I know it's bad for his health as well as mother's and mine.
sentences.chinese: 我知道吸菸有害他的健康，對我和媽媽也有害無益。
